entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blowing snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the evening. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
